name: caesarbot
description: - Architecture 	- We need an initializing script 		- This script will ask the user for the politcal campaign idea 		- Generate the goals 		- Generate the initial strategy 	- Tweeting script 		- Find out what to tweet (on a set interval) 		- Generating tweets based on the saved strategy  		- It will find a user to reply to  			- We're going to be vectorizing each reply and comparing it to our political campaign 	- Engagement script 		- Analyzing our engagement stats 			- How our tweets are performing 			- Changing the strategy if the tweets don't perform well
